thread.title: Weekend Break
thread.title_full: Weekend Break - Review of Relais Fontana Di Trevi, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: tilerIreland
title: Weekend Break
text:
Looking at the fountain is hard to even imagine where the workers started. It's such an intricate design and the statues are huge. The water flowing out makes the most amazing and calming sound and it's easy to understand why this fountain is on everyone's bucket list. It's such a magic place that it almost feels like your literally watching the statues move. The ancient Romans did everything big. If something loos cool on a large scale the Romans go for super colossal size. They knew how to impress people. And this fountain will continue to impress people from all over the world for a very long time
